Articles.Content:
I'm getting the following two error messages spammed in my KSP logs and the NRE seems to be causing the game to run chronically slowly- 1/3 speed, 3FPS even on a relatively small rocket. There isn't any obvious pattern to it and it's impossible to reproduce except by accident.

Quote

[EXC 14:04:21.034] NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object

    KSP.UI.Screens.Flight.TelemetryUpdate.HideModeButton () (at <9d71e4043e394d78a6cf9193ad011698>:0)

    KSP.UI.Screens.Flight.TelemetryUpdate.Update () (at <9d71e4043e394d78a6cf9193ad011698>:0)

    UnityEngine.DebugLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)

    ModuleManager.UnityLogHandle.InterceptLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)

    UnityEngine.Debug:CallOverridenDebugHandler(Exception, Object)

Slightly different message in player.log:

  at KSP.UI.Screens.Flight.TelemetryUpdate.HideModeButton () [0x00000] in <9d71e4043e394d78a6cf9193ad011698>:0 
  at KSP.UI.Screens.Flight.TelemetryUpdate.Update () [0x00024] in <9d71e4043e394d78a6cf9193ad011698>:0 
(Filename: <9d71e4043e394d78a6cf9193ad011698> Line: 0)

 

[ERR 14:04:21.125] [Physics.PhysX] QuickHullConvexHullLib::findSimplex: Simplex input points appers to be coplanar.

(Filename: C:\buildslave\physx\build\PhysX\Source\PhysXCooking\src\convex\QuickHullConvexHullLib.cpp Line: 937) from player.log

 

I'm using KSP 1.8.1 with close to 100 mods installed, list below. I've tried searching for the hex code in the NRE within the game folders but had no luck. If anyone knows which mods use KSP.UI.Screens.Flight.TelemetryUpdate or QuickHullConvexHullLib that would help to narrow it down a bit.

Quote

KSP 1.8.1
Making History 1.8.1
Breaking Ground 1.3.1
Mod list from CKAN:
[x] Science! Continued (xScienceContinued 5.23)
4kSP - Scaled map icons and text (4kSP 0.1b)

Edited March 28, 2020 by jimmymcgoochie
Updated with player.log data
I'm having the same trouble, and I have no idea how to track down which mod is causing the problem.  Any advice?

On 4/14/2020 at 10:36 AM, sdfg said:

I'm having the same trouble, and I have no idea how to track down which mod is causing the problem.  Any advice?

Post your list of mods so we can compare them, that should help narrow it down.
